con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:8094/logicaldoc/services/rest/auth"> <resource path="/"> <resource path="getSid"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"> <param name="result" style="plain" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="login"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="u" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="pw" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"> <param name="result" style="plain" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"> <param name="request" style="plain" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"> <param name="result" style="plain" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"> <param name="username" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="password" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"> <param name="result" style="plain" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="logout"> <method name="DELETE"> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
